sections.title: Mathematical & Cryptography

links.title: Introduction to Mathematical Cryptography
links.description: Comprehensive textbook covering the mathematical foundations of cryptography.

links.title: Modern Computer Algebra
links.description: Textbook on computer algebra, essential for understanding ZK implementations.

links.title: Explicit-Formulas Database
links.description: Collection of formulas for efficient implementation of elliptic curve operations.

links.description: Textbook covering group theory, rings, and fields - fundamental to cryptography.

links.title: Computational Introduction to Number Theory and Algebra
links.description: Accessible introduction to number theory and algebra with computational focus.

links.title: A Graduate Course in Applied Cryptography
links.description: Comprehensive cryptography textbook from Stanford professors.

links.title: Elliptic Curves: Number Theory And Cryptography
links.description: Deep dive into elliptic curves and their applications in cryptography.

links.description: Introduction to pairing-based cryptography, essential for many ZK systems.

links.title: The MoonMath Manual to zk-SNARKs
links.description: Accessible introduction to the mathematics behind zk-SNARKs.

links.description: Season 1 of zkMarek aimed at intuitively explaining topics like elliptic curves, ECDSA, trusted setup, KZG and Vector commitments, Blobs, Merkle and Verkle Trees.
